 SITES 

Site Name:

Objective:

Theme:

Domain:

 DENIZENS 

Very Common 01-27

Common 28-41

Common 42-55

Common 56-69

Uncommon 70-75

Uncommon 76-81

Uncommon 82-87

Uncommon 88-93

Rare 94-95

Rare 96-97

Rare 98-99

Unforeseen 100

When the outcome of a move prompts an encounter with a denizen, you may:

>

Choose or introduce a denizen based on the situation and what you know of this place.

or

Roll on the matrix to generate a random encounter. If the field is blank, add a new denizen.

or

Identify a denizen as likely to appear, and Ask the Oracle. If the answer is no, roll on the matrix.

or

Pick two denizens, rate one as likely, and Ask the Oracle to determine which you encounter.

 NOTES 

Theme

This place holds the secrets of a bygone age.

Features

1-4Evidence of lost knowledge
5-8Inscrutable relics
9-12Ancient artistry or craft
13-16Preserved corpses or fossils
17-20Visions of this place in another time

Dangers

1-5Ancient trap
6-10Hazardous architecture or terrain
11-12Blocked or broken path
13-14Denizen protects an ancient secret
15-16Denizen reveres an ancient power
17-18Living relics of a lost age
19-20Ancient evil resurgent
21-22Dire warnings of a long-buried danger
23-24Ancient disease or contamination
25-26Artifact of terrible meaning or power
27-28Disturbing evidence of ancient wrongs
29-30Others seek power or knowledge

This place is tainted by dark magic.

Features

1-4Mystic focus or conduit
5-8Strange environmental disturbances
9-12Mystic runes or markings
13-16Blight or decay
17-20Evidence of a foul ritual

Dangers

1-5Denizen spawned from dark magic
6-10Denizen controls dark magic
11-12Denizen corrupted by dark magic
13-14Corruption marks you
15-16Innocents held in thrall
17-18Revelations of a terrible truth
19-20Mystic trap or trigger
21-22Mystic barrier or ward
23-24Illusions lead you astray
25-26Dark ritual in progress
27-28Lingering effects of a dark ritual
29-30Dread harbingers of a greater magic

Foes defend this place against intruders.

Features

5-8Guarded location
9-12Storage or repository

17-20Command center or leadership

Dangers

11-12Denizen ready to sound the alarm
13-14Denizen sets an ambush
15-16Denizen lures you into a trap
17-18Denizens converge on this area

25-26Unexpected leader revealed

When the outcome of a move prompts an encounter with a denizen, you may:

>

Choose or introduce a denizen based on the situation and what you know of this place.

or

Roll on the matrix to generate a random encounter. If the field is blank, add a new denizen.

or

Identify a denizen as likely to appear, and Ask the Oracle. If the answer is no, roll on the matrix.

or

Pick two denizens, rate one as likely, and Ask the Oracle to determine which you encounter.

21-43Connecting passageways
44-56Barracks or common quarters
57-64Large hall
65-68Workshop or library
69-72Command center or leadership
73-76Ladder or stairwell
77-80Storage
81-84Kitchen or larder
85-88Courtyard
89-98Something unusual or unexpected
99You transition into a new theme
100You transition into a new domain

Dangers

31-33Blocked or guarded path
34-36Caught in the open
37-39Chokepoint
40-42Trap
43-45Alarm trigger

A perilous forest of eternal shadow.

Features

21-43Dense thicket
44-56Overgrown path
57-64Waterway
65-68Clearing
69-72Elder tree
73-76Brambles
77-80Overgrown structure
81-84Rocky outcrop
85-88Camp or outpost
89-98Something unusual or unexpected
99You transition into a new theme
100You transition into a new domain

Dangers

31-33Denizen hunts
34-36Denizen lairs here
37-39Trap or snare
40-42Path leads you astray
43-45Entangling plant life

An age-old subterranean dungeon.

Features

21-43Carved passages
44-56Hall or chamber
57-64Stairs into the depths
65-68Grand doorway or entrance
69-72Tomb or catacombs
73-76Rough-hewn cave
77-80Foundry or workshop
81-84Shrine or temple
85-88Imposing architecture or artistry
89-98Something unusual or unexpected
99You transition into a new theme
100You transition into a new domain

Dangers

31-33Ancient mechanism or trap
34-36Crumbling architecture
37-39Blocked or broken passage
40-42Artifact with a hidden danger
43-45Denizen lurks in darkness

{{payThePrice}}
{{#rollBetween() payThePrice 1 2}}Roll again and apply that result but make it worse. If you roll this result yet again, think of something dreadful that changes the course of your quest (Ask the Oracle if unsure) and make it happen.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 1 2}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 3 5}}A person or community you trusted loses faith in you, or acts against you.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 3 5}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 6 9}}A person or community you care about is exposed to danger.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 6 9}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 10 16}}You are separated from something or someone.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 10 16}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 17 23}}Your action has an unintended effect.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 17 23}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 24 32}}Something of value is lost or destroyed.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 24 32}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 33 41}}The current situation worsens{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 33 41}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 42 50}}A new danger or foe is revealed.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 42 50}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 51 59}}It causes a delay or puts you at a disadvantage.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 51 59}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 60 68}}It is harmful.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 60 68}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 69 77}}It is stressful.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 69 77}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 78 85}}A surprising development complicates your quest.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 78 85}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 86 90}}It wastes resources.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 86 90}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 91 94}}It forces you to act against your best intentions.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 91 94}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 95 98}}A friend, companion, or ally is put in harm’s way (or you are, if alone){{/rollBetween() payThePrice 95 98}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 99 100}}Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse.{{/rollBetween() payThePrice 99 100}}
{{/payThePrice}} {{#endureHarm}}
{{endureHarm}}
{{#rollBetween() endureHarm 1 10}}The harm is mortal. Face Death.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 11 20}}You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or Face Death.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 11 20}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 21 35}} You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, Face Death.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 21 35}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 36 50}}You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 36 50}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 51 100}}You are battered but still standing.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 51 100}}
{{/endureHarm}} {{#endureStress}}
{{endureStress}}
{{#rollBetween() endureStress 1 10}}You are overwhelmed. Face Desolation.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 11 25}}You give up. Forsake Your Vow (if possible, one relevant to your current crisis).{{/rollBetween() endureStress 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 26 50}}You give in to a fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 26 50}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 51 100}}You persevere.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 51 100}}

{{/sitesRevealADangerAlt}} {{#threatAdvanceAThreat}}
{{threatAdvanceAThreat}}
{{#rollBetween() threatAdvanceAThreat 1 30}} The threat readies its next step, or a new danger looms. If you are in a position to prevent this development, you may attempt to do so. If you succeed, Reach a Milestone. Otherwise, mark menace. {{/rollBetween() threatAdvanceAThreat 1 30}} {{#rollBetween() threatAdvanceAThreat 31 70}} The threat works subtly to advance toward its goal, or the danger escalates. Mark menace. {{/rollBetween() threatAdvanceAThreat 31 70}} {{#rollBetween() threatAdvanceAThreat 71 100}} The threat makes a dramatic and immediate move, or a major event reveals new complications. Mark menace twice. {{/rollBetween() threatAdvanceAThreat 71 100}}
{{/threatAdvanceAThreat}} {{#sufferEndureHarm}}
{{sufferEndureHarm}}
{{#rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 1 10}} The harm is mortal. {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 11 20}} You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or Face Death. {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 11 20}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 21 35}} You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, Face Death. {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 21 35}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 36 50}} You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move). {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 36 50}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 51 100}} You are battered but still standing. {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureHarm 51 100}}
{{/sufferEndureHarm}} {{#sufferEndureStress}}
{{sufferEndureStress}}
{{#rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 1 10}} You are overwhelmed. Face Desolation. {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 11 25}} You give up. Forsake Your Vow (if possible, one relevant to your current crisis). {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 26 50}} You give in to a fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts. {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 26 50}} {{#rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 51 100}} You persevere {{/rollBetween() sufferEndureStress 51 100}}
{{/sufferEndureStress}} {{#fatePayThePrice}}
{{fatePayThePrice}}
{{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 1 2}} Roll again and apply that result but make it worse. If you roll this result yet again, think of something dreadful that changes the course of your quest (Ask the Oracle if unsure) and make it happen. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 1 2}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 3 5}} A person or community you trusted loses faith in you, or acts against you. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 3 5}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 6 9}} A person or community you care about is exposed to danger. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 6 9}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 10 16}} You are separated from something or someone. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 10 16}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 17 23}} Your action has an unintended effect. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 17 23}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 24 32}} Something of value is lost or destroyed. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 24 32}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 33 41}} The current situation worsens. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 33 41}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 42 50}} A new danger or foe is revealed. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 42 50}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 51 59}} It causes a delay or puts you at a disadvantage. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 51 59}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 60 68}} It is harmful. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 60 68}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 69 77}} It is stressful. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 69 77}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 78 85}} A surprising development complicates your quest. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 78 85}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 86 90}} It wastes resources. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 86 90}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 91 94}} It forces you to act against your best intentions. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 91 94}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 95 98}} A friend, companion, or ally is put in harms way (or you are, if alone) {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 95 98}} {{#rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 99 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse. {{/rollBetween() fatePayThePrice 99 100}}
{{/fatePayThePrice}}

{{mysticBacklash}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 1 4}} Your ritual has the opposite affect. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 1 4}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 5 8}} You are sapped of strength. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 5 8}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 9 12}} Your friend, ally, or companion is adversely affected. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 9 12}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 13 16}} You destroy an important object. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 13 16}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 17 20}} You inadvertently summon a horror. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 17 20}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 21 24}} You collapse, and drift into a troubled sleep. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 21 24}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 25 28}} You undergo a physical torment which leaves its mark upon you. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 25 28}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 29 32}} You hear ghostly voices whispering of dark portents. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 29 32}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 33 36}} You are lost in shadow, and find yourself in another place without memory of how you got there. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 33 36}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 37 40}} You alert someone or something to your presence. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 37 40}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 41 44}} You are not yourself, and act against a friend, ally, or companion. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 41 44}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 45 48}} You affect or damage your surroundings, causing a disturbance or potential harm. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 45 48}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 49 52}} You waste resources. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 49 52}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 53 56}} You suffer the loss of a sense for several hours. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 53 56}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 57 60}} You lose your connection to magic for a day or so, and cannot perform rituals. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 57 60}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 61 64}} Your ritual affects the target in an unexpected and problematic way. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 61 64}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 65 68}} Your ritual reveals a surprising and troubling truth. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 65 68}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 69 72}} You are tempted by dark powers. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 69 72}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 73 76}} You see a troubling vision of your future. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 73 76}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 77 80}} You can't perform this ritual again until you acquire an important component. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 77 80}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 81 84}} You develop a strange fear or compulsion. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 81 84}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 85 88}} Your ritual causes creatures to exhibit strange or aggressive behavior. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 85 88}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 89 92}} You are tormented by an apparition from your past. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 89 92}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 93 96}} You are wracked with sudden sickness. {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 93 96}} {{#rollBetween() mysticBacklash 97 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse {{/rollBetween() mysticBacklash 97 100}}

{{payThePrice}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 1 2}} Roll again and apply that result but make it worse. If you roll this result yet again, think of something dreadful that changes the course of your quest (Ask the Oracle if unsure) and make it happen. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 1 2}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 3 5}} A person or community you trusted loses faith in you, or acts against you. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 3 5}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 6 9}} A person or community you care about is exposed to danger. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 6 9}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 10 16}} You are separated from something or someone. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 10 16}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 17 23}} Your action has an unintended effect. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 17 23}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 24 32}} Something of value is lost or destroyed. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 24 32}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 33 41}} The current situation worsens {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 33 41}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 42 50}} A new danger or foe is revealed. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 42 50}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 51 59}} It causes a delay or puts you at a disadvantage. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 51 59}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 60 68}} It is harmful. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 60 68}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 69 77}} It is stressful. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 69 77}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 78 85}} A surprising development complicates your quest. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 78 85}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 86 90}} It wastes resources. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 86 90}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 91 94}} It forces you to act against your best intentions. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 91 94}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 95 98}} A friend, companion, or ally is put in harms way (or you are, if alone) {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 95 98}} {{#rollBetween() payThePrice 99 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse. {{/rollBetween() payThePrice 99 100}}
{{endureHarm}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 1 10}} The harm is mortal. Face Death. {{/rollBetween() endureHarm 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 11 20}} You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or Face Death. {{/rollBetween() endureHarm 11 20}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 21 35}} You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, Face Death. {{/rollBetween() endureHarm 21 35}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 36 50}} You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move). {{/rollBetween() endureHarm 36 50}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 51 100}} You are battered but still standing. {{/rollBetween() endureHarm 51 100}}
{{endureStress}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 1 10}} You are overwhelmed. Face Desolation. {{/rollBetween() endureStress 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 11 25}} You give up. Forsake Your Vow (if possible, one relevant to your current crisis). {{/rollBetween() endureStress 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 26 50}} You give in to a fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts. {{/rollBetween() endureStress 26 50}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 51 100}} You persevere. {{/rollBetween() endureStress 51 100}}

{{#rollGreater() actionRarity challenge1}} {{#rollTotal() challenge1 challenge2}} {{#rollTotal() actionRarity sixRarityDie}} {{/rollTotal() actionRarity sixRarityDie}} {{#rollTotal() actionRarity {{findOpportunity}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 1 25}} The terrain favors you, or you find a hidden path. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 1 25}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 26 45}} An aspect of the history or nature of this place is revealed. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 26 45}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 46 57}} You locate a secure area. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 46 57}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 58 68}} A clue offers insight or direction. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 58 68}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 69 78}} You get the drop on a denizen. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 69 78}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 79 86}} This area provides an opportunity to scavenge, forage, or hunt. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 79 86}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 87 90}} You locate an interesting or helpful object. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 87 90}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 91 94}} You are alerted to a potential threat. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 91 94}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 95 98}} You encounter a denizen who might support you. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 95 98}} {{#rollBetween() findOpportunity 99 100}} You encounter a denizen in need of help. {{/rollBetween() findOpportunity 99 100}}
{{advanceThreat}} {{#rollBetween() advanceThreat 1 30}} The threat readies its next step, or a new danger looms. If you are in a position to prevent this development, you may attempt to do so. If you succeed, Reach a Milestone. Otherwise, mark menace. {{/rollBetween() advanceThreat 1 30}} {{#rollBetween() advanceThreat 31 70}} The threat works subtly to advance toward its goal, or the danger escalates. Mark menace. {{/rollBetween() advanceThreat 31 70}} {{#rollBetween() advanceThreat 71 100}} The threat makes a dramatic and immediate move, or a major event reveals new complications. Mark menace twice. {{/rollBetween() advanceThreat 71 100}}
{{revealDanger}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 1 30}} Check the theme card. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 1 30}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 31 45}} Check the domain card. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 31 45}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 46 57}} You encounter a hostile denizen. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 46 57}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 58 68}} You face an environmental or architectural hazard. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 58 68}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 69 76}} A discovery undermines or complicates your quest. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 69 76}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 77 79}} You confront a harrowing situation or sensation. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 77 79}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 80 82}} You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 80 82}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 83 85}} Your way is blocked or trapped. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 83 85}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 86 88}} A resource is diminished, broken, or lost. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 86 88}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 89 91}} You face a perplexing mystery or tough choice. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 89 91}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 92 94}} You lose your way or are delayed. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 92 94}} {{#rollBetween() revealDanger 95 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse. {{/rollBetween() revealDanger 95 100}}
{{revealDangerAlt}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 1 22}} You encounter a hostile denizen. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 1 22}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 23 42}} You face an environmental or architectural hazard. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 23 42}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 43 58}} A discovery undermines or complicates your quest. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 43 58}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 59 64}} You confront a harrowing situation or sensation. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 59 64}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 65 70}} You face the consequences of an earlier choice or approach. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 65 70}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 71 76}} The path is blocked or trapped. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 71 76}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 77 82}} A resource is diminished, broken, or lost. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 77 82}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 83 88}} You face a perplexing mystery or tough choice. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 83 88}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 89 94}} You lose your way or are delayed. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 89 94}} {{#rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 95 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, make it worse. {{/rollBetween() revealDangerAlt 95 100}}
